rows.label: tev000991_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah, [ST:playername ]. What wonderful timing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0002
rows.name:
I was just trying to teach these baby BLADEs
the mind-set they'll need to survive in the field.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0003
rows.name:
But they don't seem to truly grasp what I'm saying.
They may not yet have enough real-world experience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0004
rows.name:
Perhaps you, the victor of countless battles, could teach
them the key to your survival in a way they might more
easily understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev000991_JNK0010
rows.name: Aggression

rows.label: qev000991_SEL0011
rows.name: Explain that the first punch thrown decides the fight.

rows.label: qev000991_JNK0020
rows.name: Discretion

rows.label: qev000991_SEL0021
rows.name: Explain that discretion is the better part of valor.

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0005
rows.name:
Well said, for that is the mind-set of the warrior!
You strike first, you strike fast, and you strike hard!
Courage is your sword and shield![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0006
rows.name:
Ha ha! Look at their eyes! Witness the fire you have
kindled in their hearts![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0007
rows.name:
So you're saying they should consider every option
carefully, then make the choice that best ensures
their survival?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0008
rows.name:
So that is the secret to your longevity. Not savagery,
but resourcefulness. Not haste, but thoughtfulness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0009
rows.name:
I must admit that your cool and collected approach to
battle is somewhat...alien to me. But no one wants to
see these disciples return with their lives more than I.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0010
rows.name:
I hope your words ring out in their hearts as they set
foot on their first battlefield.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0011
rows.name:
I could tell you had a gift for educating and inspiring
others, and I see now how right my intuition was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0012
rows.name:
What say you, [ST:playername ]?
Will you help me forge these lumps of soft metal
into tempered-steel BLADEs?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0013
rows.name:
For while I'm honored to have been asked to serve as
their guide, my Harrier duties suffer in the meantime.
I could use a second fount of wisdom to aid me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0014
rows.name:
I was hesitating about this job, but would ask you to
please consider my proposal. Think of the exceptional
BLADEs you could help them become![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev000991_JNK0030
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev000991_SEL0031
rows.name: Shout a Zen Buddhist "katsu" to rebuke Bozé.

rows.label: qev000991_JNK0040
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev000991_SEL0041
rows.name: Accept Bozé's request with a solemn nod of the head.

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0015
rows.name:
Did you... Did you just katsu me? ...ME?!
I don't know if I should be proud you've learned it,
or ashamed to have given you reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0016
rows.name:
But you...are right. I have accepted duties beyond what
I can complete, and am now attempting to save myself
by inflicting the same upon you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0017
rows.name:
The failing is indeed not in your refusal to help,
but in my own arrogance in biting off more than I
could possibly chew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0018
rows.name:
I should not have strayed from my path as a Harrier
so soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0019
rows.name:
Once I've attained the enlightenment I seek from it,
I will rededicate myself to the teacher's path.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0020
rows.name:
Thank you, [ST:playername ].
You have used the katsu well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0021
rows.name:
I am pleased to hear it! In that case, I must ask you
to begin an intensive study of the sacred sutras,
as my instruction is based on the Buddha's wisdom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0022
rows.name:
If you believe that all the Buddha has to teach is the
Noble Eightfold Path, you will be pleasantly surprised![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0023
rows.name:
Many of his teachings are relevant to a warrior's life
on the battlefield.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0024
rows.name:
I shall begin preparing crates of the most essential
texts and have them shipped to your room immediately.
Read and memorize each before starting the next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000991_MSG0025
rows.name:
How I look forward to lengthy discussions of the
Tripitaka during your study breaks![ST:wait ]
